p: Territory of Washington In Justice Court before County of Walla Walla OP Lacy Justice of the Peace
Territory of Washington Charged with being an habitual vs Drunkard and disorderly Adaline Oneil Deft person

Jany 8th Complaint in the above entitled cause filed and Defendant Adaline Oneil arrested and into? Court and cause continued to deny 6th 1876 at ten oclock AM at said hour Deft Adaline Oneil in Court in person and being duly arraigned pleads not guilty whereupon the following witnesses were? sworn on the law of the Territory John unclear G P Foos? Henry Chase? Henry John G Justice Defendant offers no evidence and it appearing and some the evidence that the said Adaline Oneil is an habitual drunkard and disorderly person the said court did adjudge and deter mine that the said Adaline Oneil give bonds in the sum of one hundred dollars for her good behavior for the sum of three months and in default thereof that the said Adaline Oneil be committed to the Jail of Walla Walla County and default
Given under my hand this 6th day of January 1876
Territory of Washington vs Adaline Oneil Certificate of Conviction
